refnamediv.refpurpose: Get number of fields in result

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: monetdb_num_fields returns the number of fields in the result set.

example.title: monetdb_num_fields example
example.programlisting:
<?php
monetdb_connect();
monetdb_query("ls;");
for($i=0;$i<monetdb_num_fields();$i++) {
	printf("field %s: name=%s type=%s\n", $i, monetdb_field_name($i), monetdb_field_type($i));
}
?>

refsect1.para: See also monetdb_field_name, monetdb_field_type and monetdb_query.
